name: Ultrasound Accusonic Plus
descr:
The Accusonic Plus therapeutic ultrasound now offers 1 and 3 MHz from the one detachable applicator. Microprocessor technology has been used to make the Accusonic Plus compact and easy to use. This technology has allowed a number of useful features to be presented in the Accusonic Plus. Battery unit is available as an option, which will allow the physician to use the unit outside the clinic. Gel included.

Specifications: 25x12x25 cm.
